attributes.action: Put India on the Red list with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: Put India on the Red list with immediate effect as the number of cases and new variants emerging out of India are a great threat to UK economy and pose a great risk to the health of the UK general population.
attributes.background: Put India on the Red list with immediate effect as the number of cases and new variants emerging out of India are a great threat to UK economy and pose a great risk to the health of the UK general population.
